title: Bi/gay Guy Gamerssss?
body:
Looking for some diversity hereeee ahah, if you're a guy and you're gay/bi add me and let's play some games, I'm honestly just trying to see if there is much of the community who is gay/bi and if so, ADD ME!!! :)
IGN: Your Girl

replies.body: ...This is an odd place to ask for sexually confused people, try Grinder...

> [{quoted}](name=Wast3land ,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=mkT09t9N,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-09T08:44:22.789+0000)
>
> ...This is an odd place to ask for sexually confused people, try Grinder..

Such a rude thing to say... the community has done nothing to you why called them confused? how are they even confused, what cause they like the same gender. You homophobic people are confusing
Is a joke man chill, I dont hate gays, ever heard of Sky Williams? Guys adorable dude
